title: Difference between Retina Mid-2014 13" and Retina Early 2015 13" Top-Lid
message: I found out about six months ago that the top-lid assembly for the 13" Retina Mid-2014 and 13" Retina Early 2015 are not interchangeable even though they look identical. However now I have a stack of these Top-Lids that I need to go through and they look identical. Does anyone have any experience with these and know how to spot the difference in manufacture year?

title: Difference between Retina Mid-2014 13" and Retina Early 2015 13" Top-Lid
message: You can try manufacture stamp date. Generally, any aluminum part will have it.

title: Difference between Retina Mid-2014 13" and Retina Early 2015 13" Top-Lid
message: As far as I know you can't see it on the outside. Test on a machine is the only way.
